translations: 温暖舒适的（toasty 的比较级）

sentences.sentence: Compared to people who kept their homes no warmer than 20 degrees Celsius (68 degrees Fahrenheit) in the fall and winter, those who liked a toastier home were twice as likely to become obese.
sentences.translation: 与在秋季和冬季将室温保持在20摄氏度(68华氏度)以下相比，那些喜欢将室温保持较高的人群成为肥胖的几率将增加2倍。
